official_title: To temporarily prevent the discontinuance by Amtrak of commuter rail service between Valparaiso, Indiana, and Chicago, Illinois.

summary.text: Prohibits the National Railroad Passenger Corporation (Amtrak) from discontinuing commuter rail service between Valparaiso, Indiana, and Chicago, Illinois, before July 1, 1991.

titles.title: To temporarily prevent the discontinuance by Amtrak of commuter rail service between Valparaiso, Indiana, and Chicago, Illinois.
